meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7018.

td.p: Laura Lorson, a newscaster and editor from Perry, Kansas
Dave Perkins, a high school assistant principal from Wenatchee, Washington
Alvin Chin, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $32,100)

tr.td: NEW TO THE SCRABBLE PLAYERS DICTIONARY
FILE UNDER "Q"
ABBREVIATED REALITY
NOT-SO-DESPERATE MEASURES
STATE HOLIDAYS
DONE & DONE
